beer.beer_description:
Brewed with our farm grown pilsner malt and using the traditional triple decoction method. 

This Czech Pilsner is a rich expression of heritage and craft. Deep malt complexity meets a crisp, clean finish. Highlighting the grains full flavor. Smooth golden and refined. 

This lager is a tribute to classic technique and home grown ingredients.

items.checkin_comment: Beer cartel #12. Very euro. Done well, locally. Chewy.

user.bio: I like beer tippage. Preferably in my face. Home brewer, my beer is always better.

items.checkin_comment: Day 12 of the beer cartel beer advent calendar for 2026, a triple decoction Czech Pils. A nice bitter Czech pils for Xmas eve and 1 less beer to drink tomorrow. It’s a clean beer with a full malt backbone and nice bitterness
